column3: Urianger looks beseechingly in your direction, fear in his eyes.
Rumors of a primal sighting in the Shroud have Urianger gravely concerned, and he would have you ascertain its identity. First, you are to seek the counsel of Bowlord Lewin.
Bowlord Lewin bids you welcome and expresses his gratitude for your aid in the investigation of the primal.
Speak with Lewin at the Seat of the First Bow.
Friend to the dawn, hear my plea. Tidings most ominous arrive from Gridania─a primal walketh the Shroud.
Those who have borne the eldritch spirit witness─and returned to tell the tale─avow that ne'er before have they seen its like.

The Gods' Quiver doth investigate as we speak, and meseems Bowlord Lewin would welcome a capable adventurer's helping hand. Pray hie thee to the Seat of the First Bow and shine thy light upon the matter.
<Split(<Highlight>ObjectParameter(1)</Highlight>, ,2)/>. I have heard much of your deeds in recent days.
You come to lend your strength to the primal investigation, yes? Your aid is most welcome.
Proceed to the Seat of the First Bow?
